title: Ignition simulator lags behind rostopic outputs

content.raw:
I have been able to reproduce this issue multiple times. Let me know what else I can share to be helpful.

The sim view of the robot’s position and the image view inside the ignition window lags behind the rostopic sensor outputs.

I did the following to make sure everything was up-to-date.

```
sudo apt update
sudo apt upgrade
rm -rfv ./.ignition/fuel/
shutdown -r now

cd ~/subt_ws/src/tunnel_circuit/
hg pull && hg up
cd ~/subt_ws/
catkin_make install
```

And ran the following:

```
source /opt/ros/melodic/setup.bash
source ~/subt_ws/install/setup.bash
ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_01 robotName1:=X4 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2
```

And then ran my controller.

I flew into the tunnel and then returned. The screenshot is when rqt shows that I crashed into the tunnel entrance while the sim window and sim image show the vehicle still inside the tunnel. The delay was about 30 seconds in real time.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/661817765-igndelay2.png)
